title: Repo sync

Corrected Copilot feature table to indicate Pro+ lacks content exclusions.

summary:

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Clarified metadata restrictions behavior for squash merges in branch rulesets documentation.
- Corrected Copilot feature table to indicate Pro+ lacks content exclusions.
- Updated `@primer/octicons` dependency to 19.15.5.
- Added new excluded links for link validation.
- Changed `exec_sponsor` in ownership.yaml to `ahalliop`.
- Synced secret scanning data with new patterns and updated OpenAPI descriptions.
